content.rendered:
*This item has a minimum order quantity of 10*

The Pollock Stackable Side chair is a very attractive stacking side chair which is comfortable, durable and suitable for busy commercial venues.

This chair stacks to 5 high.

Available in a wide selection of faux leathers, fabrics or any other material (see below). The Pollock is lovingly handmade and available in a wide range of wood stains.

As these items are made to order you can customise this to suit your needs. Please call or email us if you have a bespoke request.

If you’d rather choose your own fabric please select from the materials below & call or email us. (COM – Customers Own Material).

This item has a 1 year warranty.
